summary: Senior management consultant leading data-driven transformation projects and advising government leaders while engineering hands-on analytics solutions.

projects.title: Public Sector Digital Transformation
projects.diagram:
graph LR
  DB[(Legacy Data)] --> ETL[SSIS/Azure]
  ETL --> DW[(SQL Data Warehouse)]
  DW --> PBI[Power BI Dashboards]
  PBI --> EXEC{Executive Insights}

par.problem: Government clients struggled with fragmented data ecosystems, preventing executive visibility into critical operations.
par.action: Architected target operating models and deployed advanced Power BI dashboards to track customer journeys.
par.result: Delivered sustainable digital transformation, aligning technical execution with strategic business objectives.

par.problem: Legacy contact center infrastructure lacked integration, leading to poor customer insights and operational inefficiencies.
par.action: Led the design and deployment of modern BI solutions, integrating data from multiple channels for a unified view.
par.result: Enhanced operational efficiency and enabled real-time reporting for high-stakes regulatory environments.

summary: Specialized in end-to-end Microsoft BI solutions, from architecting data warehouses to building robust reporting dashboards.

projects.title: Retail Analytics Platform Migration
projects.diagram:
graph TD
  POS[Point of Sale] --> SSIS[SSIS ETL]
  WEB[E-Commerce] --> SSIS
  SSIS --> STAGE[(Staging)]
  STAGE --> DIM{Dimension Loading}
  DIM --> CUBE[Analysis Services]

par.problem: A major Canadian clothing retailer relied on legacy systems that could not scale with their growing data volume.
par.action: Built and optimized complex ETL pipelines using SSIS and architected a new enterprise-grade data warehouse.
par.result: Successfully transitioned client to a modern analytics platform, significantly enhancing strategic insight capabilities.

par.problem: A major distributor lacked the reporting infrastructure to make timely inventory and sales decisions.
par.action: Collaborated with clients to define critical KPIs and delivered a custom SSRS reporting solution.
par.result: Strengthened executive decision-making and improved business responsiveness post-implementation.

summary: Managed the data and analytics team driving strategy and transformation across international operations.

par.problem: International operations relied on manual reporting processes, causing data latency and high operational costs.
par.action: Managed the full SDLC of automated reporting solutions using C#, SharePoint, and SQL.
par.result: Implemented automated processes that resulted in significant time and cost savings across multiple departments.
